Body:
How would you analyse the following sentence (in generative syntax):

No one but John attended the meeting? (an example is taken from von Fintel's 1993 paper on exceptive constructions).

I'm interested in the NP "no one but John."
Title: Syntax of exceptives (generative syntax)

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.

OwnerUser.AboutMe: Research interests: syntax, linguistic morphology, typology, historical linguistics, lexicography, lexicology, psycholinguistics, language acquisition, British accents
